column1: Little Goat Diner////Was not impressed. Came for brunch. The restaurant was crowded
column4: and hipstery. The food was meh. The roasted brussels sprouts were just plain terrible
column5: too much fish sauce. The waitress was super nice
column6: gave a great tea recommendation. She was attentive and the food came out in a timely manner. Overall we were very disappointed
column7: and even cancelled our reservation at Girl and the Goat because of it.
